post_message: It's deadline day for North Carolina Gov. Pat McCrory. The U.S. Justice Department says the state's controversial bathroom law is in violation of the Civil Rights Act and gave him until today to respond. McCrory says what he chooses to do goes beyond the Tar Heel state -- it will affect the majority of Americans.
